name: UpdateExistingTeam
description:
Update details of an existing team.

Use this tool to modify the information of an existing team. Ideal for updating team names, members, or other details.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to update.

parameters.name: team_name
parameters.description: The new name for the team to be updated.

parameters.name: team_member_user_ids
parameters.description: The list of user IDs to set as team members. This updates the team to include only these users.

value_schema.description: The list of user IDs to add to the team. If provided, the team members will be updated to be exactly the given users.
